name: Just leave me alone!
description:
WHATS IS THIS GAME?

Its a troll game about depressing life of a studen.Made  in 2 days, its singleplayer 2d.Its completely free and troll to have fun! Its has 5 levels and generally its a bit short.

                                                      HOW TO PLAY:

   Movement:wasd or up arrow down arrow left and right arrow 

   Shoot:Just click the mouse lol

PickUp:  just touch it

                                                        PRO TIP:

                                  BE GOOD AT THE GAME LMAO

Well,thats it enjoy the game and download and follow me to support me and even donate if you like.
